summary: A simple house mod addon for the mod World of Rudra. It adds some lore and a couple of buildings more that are supposed to make the desert feel more alive
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][size=3]Description[/size][/b][/u]
This mod contains a player house safe for storage with custom alchemy and enchanting table, lots of different containers to store your loot, a new usable sword, a real life painting I made myself, everything spiced with some background story of the house and of the previous owner. It also adds a bridge that connects Akko city and Lucast. 
[list]
[*]To find the house head to Akko city and find Limry house (one of the houses with a shiny blue mark), you will find the key to Goetia Entrance a little hidden in the room. When you have it go past Lucast, you will notice the house marker on the map.
[/list] 
 
[u][b][size=3]Requirements[/size][/b][/u]
Skyrim (Oldrim) and the latest version of World of Rudra (1.75), no dlc required so far but it may change with further content being added. I will try to keep it simple though.
It is REALLY important, to enjoy the mod at its fullest, to update the LOD with any mod capable of doing it.
 
[u][b][size=3]C[/size][/b][/u][u][b][size=3]redits[/size][/b]
[/u]First of all thanks to the original creator of World of Rudra Bee9999, his mod is amazing and I'm more than happy helping making it an even better experience. 
Thanks to Leadpipejustice for sharing this initiative with me and supporting me. Thanks to Darkfox127 for his tutorials for dummy modders, which I am.
Thanks to these authors for letting everyone use their resources, without them I would have a more shallow looking house:
- Tamira
- Badgremlin
- Elianora
- AARS
- Insanity

And last but not least Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit. 
Please if I forgot someone tell me
author: Goetia Team
